@themichaelowen @LukeDonald let's hope so 😃 Commiserations Luke - it must have been a close run thing & it's academic but I'd have picked u.
@piersmorgan hadn't realised you like KP? 😉 Today's result was a shocker though 😡
@SaraBeverley that's the best looking pancake I've ever seen...😉
@MichaelVaughan prefer it to be Hillsborough...

@McIlroyRory good luck tmrw Rory 😎
@XtineDorrian @RealCFrampton it'll all be worth it after you beat KM..😃
@danrafaelespn @mubs7 @PrinceNaseemH wow how time flies....had a heavy cold before this fight as I recall.
@woodhousecurtis @BladesFanCentre isn't the obvious enough?
@GaryLineker @piersmorgan Podolski has what it takes if he is given a run in the side...
@FrankLampardUK scripted response perhaps? Good signing, but tough to secure a regular first team place if Costa maintains form and fitness.

@GaryLineker thought he'd buy Remy - Frenchman and all that...
@GaryLineker @OfficialFOXES there speaks a man with high expectations 😉 Good performance today, chances for all 3 points. should stay up.
@Lord_Sugar anybody would think Spurs lost 3 nil at home today! At least the gooners didn't beat Leicester...

@SkyGlennMcCrory I wondered what the beard was for....😎

@WestwoodLee @MichaelVaughan what's worse - commentating on Eng losing wickets or watching Weds unable to score with that much possession?
@WestwoodLee Daylight Robbery!! Just to rub salt in the wound (ex owl) Antonio pushes our full back and crosses in for Lans goal...gutted!!
@MichaelVaughan daylight robbery!!! Massive possession advantage but we just couldn't score today. #gutted 😠
@MichaelVaughan now he's tackling our players and giving them the ball - unbelievable!!!
@MichaelVaughan ref has had a Forest shirt on throughout this game. come in Weds make this possession count! ⚽️
@MichaelVaughan lucky goal and a push in the back from Antonio!
@MichaelVaughan ref giving all 50 50's to Forest at present...😎👎
@BBCSport @Swannyg66 D'oh!
@BBCSport come on AC prove that @Swannyg66 wrong with a run a ball ton 😎 👍
@NextBigFight @Tyson_Fury unlucky with postponements but need to stay busy - regret later in life otherwise! Actions speak louder than words
@WorldBoxingNews @KidGalahad90 @SkyJohnnyNelson ha ha I'm sure it may be tempting for at least 5 seconds but your knee is as good as mine! 😉
